skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.
Shield all for 2 x (400 + 60% Defense) Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party applies a stack of Age to Ancients.
Aura: Healing and shielding skills (active and passive) of Ancients in your party are increased by 15%. They start combat with Age.
Aura: At the beginning of each turn, remove a random Debuff from Ancients in the party. They start combat with Age.
Aura: Ancients and Monsters with Aging start combat with an Age stack.
Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party is revived, it additionally heals 20% of its Max Health, gains 3 random Debuffs and 3 Age stacks.
